Text: Beware the Heavens is the first album by the power metal band Sinergy, released in 1999.
Triplets:<Beware the Heavens
3:
--------------------
Text: Beware the Heavens:  This is the only album where Jesper Strömblad (In Flames guitarist) plays guitar alongside Alexi Laiho; his position was filled in by Roope Latvala on all subsequent albums.
Triplets:<Jesper Strömblad
